root.static-content:
Enterprise portals

Enterprise portals are an essential tool in every organization as

they enable information and knowledge to be distributed among

the variousgroups in the organization.

Such knowledge management systems are instrumental to

modern organizations seeking to see ROI from their knowledge

workers.

IMF IT specializes in the establishment of professional portals and

in tailoring them to the organization’s specific needs, using

SharePoint 2010 and Moss 2007 Platforms.

IMF IT offers the follo wing services:

  • Characterization and establishment of SharePoint based enterprise portals.
  • Development of applications based on the portal platform.
  • Development of forms based on the Paperless Office concept.
  • Implementation as well as training and support for enterprise users
